New_York.45 Broad Street:
45 Broad Street is a skyscraper under construction in the Financial District of Manhattan, New York, U.S. The building will be entirely residential, and is being developed by Madison Equities on Broad Street.


== History and construction ==
A proposal dating to 2008 planned a Nobu Hotel for the site, which was backed by Robert De Niro. The building, a conventional glass curtain wall, would have contained a retail base, 128 hotel rooms, and 77 "super-luxury" condominiums above the hotel.
